name: Dilly Honey Mustard Dressing
description: Get ready for your new, favourite dressing! Honey mustard meets dill in one creamy, dairy-free dressing. It was inspired by Manitoba’s famous Honey Dill Sauce. And wait for it—it’s not just delicious; it’s got nutritious, powerhouse ingredients in it like nutritional yeast and turmeric. Use it to level up your salads or power bowls, or even use it as a dip for your sliced veggies.
preparation: In a small bowl, whisk together mayo, dressing mix, vinegar, and honey.
If desired, stir in a splash of dill pickle juice.
tips: For a vegan dressing, swap honey for maple syrup and mayo for your fave vegan alternative.
